headline: Invesco’s 1,500 Stock ETF Gained 227% While Everyone Forgot About Small Caps
summary: When small-cap stocks underperform for years, investors often forget they exist. Then sentiment shifts, and suddenly everyone remembers why diversified exposure to smaller companies matters. Invesco RAFI US 1500 Small-Mid ETF (NASDAQ:PRFZ) exists for that moment, offering a fundamentally weighted approach to 1,500 US small and mid-cap stocks that sidesteps the concentration risks of traditional ...
